promptOptimization.conciseInstructions: Provide focused analysis in 3 sections: THREAT ASSESSMENT (2-3 sentences), KEY FINDINGS (3-4 bullet points), RECOMMENDED ACTIONS (2-3 specific steps). Limit response to 450 tokens maximum.
promptOptimization.contextFiltering: Focus analysis on: 1) Immediate security impact, 2) Specific threat indicators, 3) Actionable remediation steps. Exclude general security advice or background information.
promptOptimization.responseFormat: Use bullet points and short paragraphs. Prioritize actionable intelligence over explanatory content.

templateResponses.lowRiskConclusion: Risk Level: LOW. Monitor for pattern changes.
templateResponses.mediumRiskConclusion: Risk Level: MEDIUM. Investigate within 4 hours.
templateResponses.highRiskConclusion: Risk Level: HIGH. Immediate action required.
